title: Shadow
description: Intelligent, incorporeal (but not undead) monsters that look like shadows. Able to slightly change their shape.
extras: Surprise: On a 1–5.	Strength drain: Victims lose 1 STR per hit. Recovers after 8 turns. If reduced to 0 STR, the victim becomes a shadow.	Mundane damage immunity: Can only be harmed by magical attacks.	Spell immunity: Unaffected by charm and sleep spells.
